description.@en: A lens levitates before your eye, powerfully magnifying all beyond it.

criticalFailure.@en: Levitating before you, the lens is encircled within a burning blue flame. What you see within the lens is not of this world, a far off star of pulsating intelligence surrounded by flute-playing things beyond. You must immediately succeed at a Resolve Test or be subjected to Stress.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the Duration.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you can now see three times as far. In addition, you can perfectly see through concealment such as bushes, fog and smoke.
